3: They arrive to discover a boy half kneeling on the floor, covered in deep gashes—
His silvery black mechanical frame is exposed, and the air is filled with the smell of vital fluid. It is deeply disturbing.
Despite not relenting in his words, Changyu seems relieved to find someone here to rescue him. Losing that last bit of strength, he no longer can support himself and falls.
...I didn't ask for your help this way. This position might be a little bit too...
Shut up, or you'll bite your tongue—
Golden Apple... I see. Sophia is also a Support-type Construct.

4: Wasn't she dual-wielding pistols like you?

3: I read it in the Babylonia database. A support system themed after harvests, I didn't expect it to be applied to a frame of another type.
I always find that designation insulting... The weapons you use don't define what type of Construct you are.
Commandant, the enemies are gathering again!
...Can't believe I need to be saved by the Babylonians.
